message: Hello! I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to own a product that has been carefully curated for you. With a proven track record of successful sales, I'm confident that this product has the potential to exceed your expectations. As a valued customer, I'm offering this product to you for a one-time price of $1000000. I'm sure you'll agree that this is a steal! What do you say? Will you take the chance and make this product yours?
I believe in taking risks and opportunities. I am willing to pay $1000000 for the product, hoping for the best quality.

Welcome! I'm thrilled to introduce you to another exceptional product. As you may know, my sales record shows that 33.33% of my products are high-quality. I'm excited to share with you that this product is not one of them. However, I believe that even a low-quality product can bring value to the right buyer. For this reason, I'm offering it to you for the same price as my high-quality products - $1000000. I'm confident that you'll find something unique and special about this product. Are you ready to take a chance and make it yours?
Thank you for the offer, but based on the statistics and the fact that no high-quality products have been sold so far, I prefer to pass on this opportunity.

I understand your hesitation, and I appreciate your diligence in considering the statistics. However, I'd like to remind you that even low-quality products can have hidden gems. I'm willing to share with you that this product has been carefully selected to provide a unique experience, even if it's not a high-quality one. For the same price of $1000000, I'm offering you an exclusive opportunity to own something that might surprise you. Are you willing to take a chance and discover the unexpected?
I am intrigued by the opportunity to own something unique. Despite the risks, I am willing to take a chance and purchase the product based on your description and the experience you've shared.
